title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When attempting to click on the first Combo in the "Add a new CVS Repository" dialog, the focus caret does not appear in the first Combo box labeled "Host".
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, the expected behavior is for the focus caret to appear in the first Combo box labeled "Host".
EB: The focus caret should be in the first Combo box labeled "Host" after clicking on it.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open the "Add a new CVS Repository" dialog. Press the "Tab" key to navigate the dialog and observe that the focus goes to the second Combo box labeled "Repository Path" instead of the first Combo box labeled "Host".
